sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
participant Main
participant LoginCubit
participant LoginScreen
participant EmailForm
participant PasswordForm
participant LoginButton
User -> Main: open app
Main -> LoginCubit: provide cubit
Main -> LoginScreen: navigate to
LoginScreen -> EmailForm: show email form
LoginScreen -> PasswordForm: show password form
LoginScreen -> LoginButton: show login button
User -> EmailForm: enter email
User -> PasswordForm: enter password
User -> LoginButton: click login
LoginButton -> LoginCubit: login
LoginCubit -> LoginState: emit state
@enduml
state_management_flow: The state is managed using the Cubit pattern. LoginCubit handles the state for the login process and emits states like initial, loading, success, and failure. The LoginScreen listens to the state changes and updates the UI accordingly.
navigation_flow: The app starts with the main.dart file, which provides the necessary Cubits and navigates to the LoginScreen. The LoginScreen contains the email form, password form, and login button.
